overview.base: You become @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak} ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, @L[Core:Cover]{three-quarters cover}, or some other feature which the @L[Core:GM]{GM} determines is appropriate for being @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

overview.base: At the start of each of your @L[Core:Turns]{turns}, you @L[Core:Healing]{heal} and regain that many @L[Core:HP]{HP}. This does not consume your @L[Core:HP]{hit die}. If you take @L[Damage:Fire]{fire damage}, this effect doesn't apply on your next @L[Core:Turns]{turn}.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.
You have @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming} and @L[Ability:Diving]{Diving} but are @L[Condition:Slow]{slow} on land.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming}.
